text.section: The determination shall be under the supervision and control of the court. The amount so determined shall be credited upon the secured claim, and any deficiency shall be treated as an unsecured claim. If the claimant surrenders his security to the liquidator, the entire claim shall be allowed as if unsecured.

law.history: Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 301, subtit. 33, sec. 42, effective June 18, 1970.
